channel.title: ITunes keeps crashing :@ And other problems
channel.description:
Okay i have some weird problem with my comp...
It keeps crashing on boot up.. Mainly when i get to the login screen..
When my PC boots up my net is fine for about 20 min.. then it goes really slow.
Wont let me do system restore... Tried every restore point for the past 3 months.. I mean. i can chose the date.. I click Next to reach the screen where it says "Click next to confirm the system restore." Blah blah blah... I click next.. Nothing happens.. Ive wated an hour before..
Anyhow My msn keeps saying "cannot send message you have sent too many in the past 60 seconds"
Will load up AVG, (got rid of it cause it wasnt working) AVAST And Kasperspy.. And Ad-Aware.. But no anti spyware.. Downloaded a few.
Every link i click on from google takes me a completly different site.
Anyhow to itunes... As soon as i click AppStore it crashes.. Comes up with Itunes encounted an error and needs to close... Yet it works on every other PC i have been on.
Oh and last but not least.. Kasperspy, Avast, and Ad-Aware wont find anything :@

yh just a shit thing davids prob right i agree sanga

itunes crashed often for me, i think it is just shit. As for the other problems davidude is probably right

item.title: ITunes keeps crashing :@ And other problems
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

davidude36:

Sounds like some sort of strange virus. You seem like you haven’t reformatted in a while. I suggest backing up all your data then reformatting and getting a clean start. Makes my PC run like its brand new.

Looks like im going have to do that… I considered making a partition but
A) I dont really know how… dont wanna fuck up my HD
and B) My mate said he will lend me his external HD for abit while i format.

Read full topic
